coreAtributes.name: YoRHa blindfold
coreAtributes.description: A replica blindfold based of an outfit worn by YoRHa Operatives, although it appears to be a normal blindfold, it acts as a visor to defend against harmful spirits.

displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s blindfold and roughly pull it off [npc.her] head.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your blindfold and roughly pulls it off your head.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s blindfold and roughly pulls it off [npc2.her].

replacementText.playerNPC: You slip the blindfold over [npc.name]'s head.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the blindfold on [npc.her] face.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls the blindfold down your face, covering your eyes.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] forces the blindfold on your face, covering your eyes and robbing you of your vision!
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc.Name] pulls the blindfold down [npc2.Name]'s face, covering [npc2.her] face.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] forces the blindfold on [npc2.name]'s face, covering [npc2.her] face.] ]></NPCOtherNPCRough>

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull your blindfold up to your forehead.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls [npc.her] blindfold up to just below [npc.her] chin.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull your blindfold back down, covering your torso.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls [npc.her] blindfold back down to cover [npc.her] torso.
